data.title: Avex Trax Profile: History, Artists, and Facts (Updated!)
data.meta_description: Our Avex Trax Profile: History, Artists, and Facts is updated on a regular basis, providing up to date facts and news.
data.text:
Avex Trax Profile: History, Artists, and Facts

Avex Trax Profile: History, Artists, and Facts

Official Company Name: Avex Trax

Japanese: エイベックス トラックス

Other Company Name: –

CEO: N/A

Founder: Max Matsuura

Founding Date: September 1990

Address: Japan

Avex Trax Official Accounts:

Facebook: エイベックス株式会社

YouTube: avex

Website: avexnet.jp

Avex Trax Artists:

Groups:

Seikima-II

Debut Date: 1982

Status: disbanded

Members: Demon Kakka, Raiden Yuzawa, Xenon Ishikawa, Luke Takamura, Jail O’Hashi

Website: seikima-ii.com

S.E.S

Debut Date: Nov 1, 1997

Status: Left Avex Trax

Members: Bada, Eugene, and Shoo

Website: –

O-Zone

Debut Date: 1999

Status: Disbanded

Members: Dan Bălan, Arsenie Todiraș, Radu Sîrbu

Website: maiahi.com/index.html

web.archive.org/web/20100127040311/http://artists.universal-music.de/ozone

Dream

Debut Date: 2000

Status: disbanded

Members: Aya Takamoto, Ami Nakashima, Shizuka Nishida

Website: dream-ldh.jp

Clazziquai Project

Debut Date: 2001

Status: Hiatus

Members: DJ Clazzi, Alex, Horan

Website: –

AAA Debut Date: September 2005

Status: Hiatus

Members: Takahiro Nishijima, Misako Uno, Mitsuhiro Hidaka, Shinjiro Atae, Shuta Sueyoshi

Website: avex.jp/en/aaa

SUPER JUNIOR

Debut Date: November 6, 2005

Status: Active

Members: Leeteuk, Heechul, Yesung, Shindong, Sungmin, Eunhyuk, Siwon, Donghae, Ryeowook and Kyuhyun

Website: superjunior.smtown.com

BIGBANG

Debut Date: August 19, 2006

Status: Hiatus

Members: G-Dragon, Taeyang and Daesung

Girls’ Generation

Debut Date: August 2nd, 2007

Status: Active

Members: Taeyeon, Sunny, Tiffany, Hyoyeon, Yuri, Sooyoung, Yoona, and Seohyun

Website: girlsgeneration.smtown.com

Super Junior-M

Debut Date: Apr 8, 2008

Status: hiatus

Members: Sungmin, Eunhyuk, Siwon, Zhoumi, Donghae, Ryeowook and Kyuhyun

Website: superjunior-m.smtown.com

SHINee

Debut Date: May 25, 2008

Status: Hiatus

Members: Onew, Key, Minho, and Taemin

Website: shinee.smtown.com/Intro

U-KISS

Debut Date: Aug 28, 2008

Status: Hiatus

Members: Soohyun, Eli, Kiseop, Hoon and Jun

Website: –

Girl Next Door

Debut Date: 2008/09/03

Status: Disbanded

Members: Chisa, Daisuke Suzuki, Yuji Inoue

Website: girlnextdoor.jp

After School

Debut Date: Jan 15, 2009

Status: Hiatus

Members: NANA, UEE, RAINA, LIZZY, E-YOUNG, KAEUN, JOOYEON, KAHI

Website: –

f(x)

Debut Date: September 5, 2009

Status: Hiatus

Members: Victoria, Amber, Luna, and Krystal

Website: fx.smtown.com

Dream5

Debut Date: November 4. 2009

Status: Disbanded

Members: Kotori Shigemoto, Mikoto Hibi, Akira Takano, Yuuno Oohara, Momona Tamakawa

Website: avex.jp/dream5/

Tokyo Girls’ Style

Debut Date: May 5, 2010

Status: Active

Members: Miyu Yamabe, Yuri Nakae, Mei Shyoji, Hitomi Arai

Website: tokyogirlsstyle.jp

Orange Caramel

Debut Date: June 17, 2010

Status: hiatus

Members: Raina, Nana and Lizzy

Website: –

Lights Over Paris

Debut Date: August 2010

Status: hiatus

Members: TaLLLLL, Devin Bronson, Mike Torres, Will Pepper, Dave Gentry, Shiny

Website: web.archive.org/web/20110603011705/http://lightsoverparis.com

SKE48

Debut Date: July 27, 2011

Status: Active

Members: Yuzuki Ishiguro, Ruka Inoue, Yuuki Otani, Ayuka Kamimura, Yoshino Kitagawa, Marin Sakamoto, Aika Sugiyama, Rika Tsuzuki, Izumi Nakamura, Kano Nojima, Miyo Nomura, Jurina Matsui, Chikako Matsumoto, Chikako Matsumoto, Shiori Aoki, Yuki Arai, Mikoto Uchiyama, Yuna Ego, Rinka Oshiba, Ayaka Ota, Mina Oba, Yuna Obata, Narumi Kataoka, Ruka Kitano, Kotono Shirai, Sarina Soda, Yumana Takagi, Akane Takayanag, Saki Takeuchi, Airi Nakano, Yuzuki Hidaka, Nao Furuhata, Kaori Matsumura, Airi Mizuno, Yukina Yahagi, Honoka Aikawa, Yuka Asai, Reona Ida, Natsuki Kamata, Haruka Kumazaki, Ami Kurashima, Rara Goto, Makiko Saito, Kaho Sato, Kohaku Shirayuki, Oka Suenaga, Maya Sugawara, Akari Suda, Yuki Takahata, Marika Tani, Marina Nishi, Miki Nonogaki, Shiina Hirata, Negai Fukai, Nao Fukushi

Website: ske48.co.jp

EXO

Debut Date: Apr 8, 2012

Status: Active

Members: Suho, Xiumin, Lay, Baekhyun, Chen, Chanyeol, D.O., Kai, and Sehun

Website: exo.smtown.com

Wagakki Band

Debut Date: 2014

Status: Active

Members: Yuko Suzuhana, Kiyoshi Ibukuro, Daisuke Kaminaga, Beni Ninagawa, Kurona, Machiya, Asa, Wasabi

Website: wagakkiband.com

universal-music.co.jp/wagakkiband

Red Velvet

Debut Date: August 1, 2014

Status: Active

Members: Irene, Wendy, Seulgi, Joy and Yeri

Website: redvelvet.smtown.com

WINNER

Debut Date: Aug 17, 2014

Status: Active

Website: –

iKON

Debut Date: Sep 15, 2015

Status: Active

Members: Bobby, Jay, Ju-ne, Song, DK and Chan

Website: ikonic.yg-ikon.com

NCT

Debut Date: Sep 15, 2015

Status: Active

Members: Taeyong, Taeil, Johnny, Yuta, Kun, Doyoung, Ten, Jaehyun, WinWin, Jungwoo, Mark, Xiaojun, Hendery, Renjun, Jeno, Haechan, Jaemin, YangYang, Chenle, and Jisung

Website: nct2018.com

nct2020official.com

NCT 127

Debut Date: July 7, 2016

Status: Active

Members: Taeil, Johnny, Taeyong, Doyoung, Yuta, Jaehyun, Winwin, Jungwoo, Mark, Haechan

Website: nct127.smtown.com

BLACKPINK

Debut Date: August 8, 2016

Status: Active

Members: Jisoo, Jennie, Rosé, and Lisa

Website: ygfamily.com/artist/main.asp?LANGDIV=K&ATYPE=2&ARTIDX=70

NCT Dream

Debut Date: Aug 25, 2016

Status: Active

Members: Mark, Renjun, Jeno, Haechan, Chenle, Jaemin and Jisung

Website: nctdream.smtown.com

aespa

Debut Date: November 17, 2020

Status: Active

Members: Karina, Giselle, Winter and NingNing

Website: –

XG

Debut Date: March 18, 2022

Status: Active

Members: Jurin, Chisa, Cocona, Hinata, Maya, Juria, Amy

Co-company: YG Entertainment

Duos:

Every Little Thing

Debut Date: August 1996

Status: Active

Members: Kaori Mochida, Ichiro Ito

Do As Infinity

Debut Date: September 29, 1999

Status: Active

TVXQ!

Debut Date: December 26, 2003

Status: Active

Website: tvxq.smtown.com

SUPER JUNIOR-D&E

Debut Date: December 16, 2011

Status: Active

Members: Donghae and Eunhyuk

Website: superjunior-dne.smtown.com

Soloists:

Yoji Biomehanika

Status: Active

Groups: –

Status: Active

Status: Active

gackt-and-lovers.com

Status: Active

Groups: –

PSY

Status: Active
